reviews.text:
Feature Request: JSON Integration with ClearScan.ai
Context
ClearScan.ai, a key integration partner, is transitioning from XML to JSON for all invoice data exchanges and requires InvoiceBuddy’s immediate adoption of a JSON endpoint.
reviews.reason_text: Adoption of JSON endpoint due to ClearScan.ai transition

reviews.text: Finance stakeholders also want AI-driven field tagging (vendor, tax, due-date), while operations is concerned about meeting a 200 requests/minute SLA given ClearScan’s volume of ~10 million invoices per month and projected 3× growth next quarter.

reviews.reason_text: OCR parsing of invoice content (extract text and key fields from scans)

reviews.text: Include a tag_confidence field as a float, indicating the AI tagging confidence score.
reviews.reason_text: Include a tag_confidence field as a float

reviews.text: Ensure the API supports a sustained 200 requests/minute throughput (SLA requirement).
Use JWT for authentication and AES-256 encryption at rest to secure all data.
reviews.reason_text: Use JWT for authentication and AES-256 encryption

reviews.text:
AI Stretch
Consider implementing UNSPSC code tagging at the line-item level as a future AI-driven enhancement to meet the board’s request for standardized item classification.
